comment: Sweet, smooth, with Creme brûlée, some dark fruit, and a bit of citrus. The finish was shorter than I wanted but overall, a good bourbon.

“Tastes like a pancake breakfast” - Sarah 
A lot of maple but not too sweet
Smells of maple. Not too sweet, fairly rich and Maple finish. Sarah Garr says it smells like a pancake breakfast. It’s too much maple for me. That overwhelms everything.
Smells maple-y. Tastes like alcoholic pancake breakfast
Sweet smell. Very sweet, oily taste, mild pleasant aftertaste.
